name: Epic Games Claimer
description: A script to auto add free games from EpicGames store

DROP_BOX_TOKEN.description: A secret token to access your dropbox account from heroku. 'don't share with anyone'

KEEP_ALIVE_SECONDS.description: Amount of seconds to keep browsing session alive in epic_games_update_cookies.py

EXIT.description: Set this value to exit the loop in epic_games_update_cookies.py
